idea-plugin.name: WebSequenceDiagrams Support
idea-plugin.description:
Custom editor for the sequence diagram language defined by WebSequenceDiagrams.com. Supports:
  • Preview of generated sequence diagram (default style, bitmap only)
To Do in future versions:
  • Choice of custom style
  • Share link to rendered diagram
  • Syntax highlighting
  • Auto completion
  • Validation and error highlighting
  • Subscription support (larger diagrams, svg)
